4897.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And certainly|107|139|640$أَهْلَكْنَآ|We destroyed|112|176|5422$أَشْيَاعَكُمْ|your kinds,|100|164|16411$فَهَلْ|so is (there)|102|166|6409$مِن|any|50|82|53$مُّدَّكِرٍ|who will receive admonition?|208|208|16355$

4896.verse: And Our command is but one, like a glance of the eye.

4897.verse: And We have already destroyed your kinds, so is there any who will remember?

4898.verse: And everything they did is in written records.

4899.verse: And every small and great [thing] is inscribed.

4900.verse: Indeed, the righteous will be among gardens and rivers,

4901.verse: In a seat of honor near a Sovereign, Perfect in Ability.

4906.verse: The sun and the moon [move] by precise calculation,

4907.verse: And the stars and trees prostrate.

4908.verse: And the heaven He raised and imposed the balance

4909.verse: That you not transgress within the balance.

4910.verse: And establish weight in justice and do not make deficient the balance.

4911.verse: And the earth He laid [out] for the creatures.

4912.verse: Therein is fruit and palm trees having sheaths [of dates]

4913.verse: And grain having husks and scented plants.

4914.verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

4915.verse: He created man from clay like [that of] pottery.

4916.verse: And He created the jinn from a smokeless flame of fire.

4917.verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
